mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usedBoard(board_num, memberIdx, title, content, reg_date, block, hitCount, category, deal, price, product) VALUES (#{num}, #{memberIdx}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{category}, 0, #{price}, #{product})
INSERT INTO usedBoardFile(num, board_num, s_FileName) VALUES (used_board_file_seq.NEXTVAL, #{board_num}, #{s_FileName})
mapper.select:
SELECT board_num num, m.memberIdx memberIdx, m.nickName nickName, title, content, TO_CHAR(u.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, hitCount, category, deal, price, product FROM usedBoard u JOIN member1 m ON u.memberIdx = m.memberIdx
AND m.block = 0 AND u.block = 0
ORDER BY board_num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usedBoard u JOIN member1 m ON m.memberIdx = u.memberIdx
AND m.block = 0 AND u.block = 0

SELECT board_num num, m.memberIdx memberIdx, m.nickName nickName, title, content, u.reg_date reg_date, hitCount, category, deal, price, product FROM usedBoard u JOIN member1 m ON m.memberIdx = u.memberIdx AND m.block = 0 WHERE board_num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE usedBoard SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE board_num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (num, tablename, reportedNumber, memberIdx, memberIdx2) VALUES (report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{tablename}, #{reportedNumber}, #{memberIdx}, #{memberIdx2})
INSERT INTO usedBoardReply (num, memberIdx, board_num, content, reg_date, block, parent_num) VALUES (used_board_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{board_num}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{parent_num})
mapper.select: SELECT ubr.num num, ubr.memberIdx memberIdx, ubr.board_num board_num, content, ubr.reg_date reg_date, m.name name, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount FROM usedBoardReply ubr JOIN member1 m ON ubr.memberIdx = m.memberIdx AND m.block = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT parent_Num, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM usedBoardReply WHERE parent_Num != 0 AND block = 0 GROUP BY parent_Num ) a ON ubr.num = a.parent_Num WHERE ubr.block = 0 AND ubr.parent_Num = 0 AND board_num = #{num} ORDER BY ubr.num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ubr.num num, ubr.memberIdx memberIdx, ubr.board_num board_num, content, ubr.reg_date reg_date, m.name name, ubr.parent_Num parent_Num FROM usedBoardReply ubr JOIN member1 m ON ubr.memberIdx = m.memberIdx AND m.block = 0 WHERE ubr.block = 0 AND parent_Num = #{num} ORDER BY ubr.num ASC
